item.title: Report X-2024041409
item.description:
Report X-2024041409

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-01T15:11:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-24
  • City: CHELMSFORD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED AND WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY THREE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING SEALED BONELESS CHICKEN BREASTS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM MAINE USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER GJ3817, PAIGE BELL, 91 TIDE MILL RD, DENNYSVILLE ME 04628-5500.

item.title: Report E-2024040589
item.description:
Report E-2024040589

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-10
  • City: DRACUT
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that a 5 gallon metal pail of UN1263 General Purpose Thinner Low VOC was punctured by a forklift during loading at the previous terminal causing approximately half a gallon of product to release on the trailer. The SDS was reviewed with the caller and it was determined terminal personnel could clean the release with ppe on site. 1 20 gal DM of product and oil dry was created as waste and left onsite for the terminal to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024041157
item.description:
Report X-2024041157

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-26T15:12:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-09
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED FROM DOOR 5 IN A SMALLS BAG. THE BAG WAS SENT TO THE SMALL SORT AND DUMPED OO THE SMALL SORT CHUTE. WHEN THE PACKAGE REACHED THE BOTTOM OF THE CHUTE THE EMPLOYEE NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS DAMAGED. SHE BROUGHT THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA OR FURTHER PROCESSING. IT WAS THEN THE PACKAGE WAS DETERMINED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT.
